dict.acceptation: 重的，沉重的；大量的，浓密的；激烈的；重型的；

sent.orig: How do you find our offer on heavy-duty trucks, Mr Gao?
sent.trans: 高先生，您觉得我方关于重型卡车(heavy-duty truck)的报价怎样？

sent.orig: Big Pharma: Assist a heavy in killing 30 enemies where neither of you die.
sent.trans: 支援一个heavy,并杀死30个敌人，且你们都不死。

sent.orig: Estate market already heavy area, heavy door model, heavy environment expands heavy service.
sent.trans: 房地产市场已从重面积、重户型、重环境发展成重服务。

sent.orig: Heavy Equipment Technician: Valid Alberta or Interprovincial Journeyman Heavy Equipment Technician certification is required.
sent.trans: 重型设备技术员：有效艾伯塔省或跨省熟练工重型设备技术员证书是必需的。

sent.orig: Heavy oil inflection point temperature is an important parameter in heavy oil recovery.
sent.trans: 稠油拐点温度是稠油开采的重要参数。
